price: 196. baye bapengwi, bakosa yo te na lolenge ya misala mia bango okati ya bamboka.
arabic: لَا يَغُرَّنَّكَ تَقَلُّبُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lā yaghurrannaka taqallubu alladhīna kafarū fī al-bilādi
